name: Easy Tuna and Bean Kale Salad
author: chrisader
summary: To use kale for a salad, you may want to massage the leaves. Sounds crazy, but the leaves are softer, greener and milder to taste. I often use kale as a base in salads, in this case I have added vegetables, beans, and tuna. A delicious combination of flavors!
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package kale, stemmed and chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
½ cup canned black beans, drained
1 ½ teaspoons Italian-style salad dressing, or to taste
directions: Put kale in a bowl and massage until leaves soften
Place avocado and tomato in a separate bowl and season with salt
Combine black beans, mushrooms, and tuna with the kale
